extension.appConnectionsDescription: Allow websites to request interaction with your wallet. You will always be prompted to approve or reject a request.
extension.compatibilityModeCta: Enable compatibility mode? This extension can override other wallets like MetaMask for enhanced functionality. You can update your preference from the settings menu.
extension.compatibilityModeDescription: This wallet can override MetaMask in apps to ensure maximum compatibility. Enabling this setting may interfere with other extensions.
extension.compatibilityModeEnabled: Compatibility mode is enabled, but will not take effect on open tabs until you refresh the page.
extension.connectRequest: request permission to view your wallet and prompt for transactions
extension.decentralizedBrowsingDescription: Level up your browser by enabling onchain domains like lisa.x or sandy.nft in your address bar.
extension.displayModeDescription: Toggle the display mode to change the light and dark theme options for your wallet.
extension.notificationsDescription: Receive notifications on this device for balance changes, transactions and messages.
extension.rightClickMenuDescription: Easy access to your wallet from any webpage, with a right click.
extension.sherlockAssistantDescription: Gain insight into apps by automatically detecting wallets associated with onchain domains. Overlay rich identity details in real time.
extension.unsupportedChain: Cannot connect to unsupported network ({{originalChainId}}). This browser extension supports Ethereum, Polygon, Base and Solana networks.
extension.walletConnectionsDescription: You have authorized the following websites to connect to your wallet.

footer.copyright: © 2025 Unstoppable Domains Inc. All Rights Reserved.

manage.addressNotVerified: Your portfolio and collectibles associated with this address will not be displayed until it is verified.
manage.addressNotVerifiedNonOwner: Ownership of this address has not been verified.
manage.applyToAllDomains: Apply to all domains in wallet {{address}}
manage.avatarJpgOrPngAndMaxSize: Recommended: 1000x1000px, 5MB max size, JPG, PNG or GIF.
manage.avatarNftRequirements:
Choose an NFT from wallet **{{address}}** using the format below. An NFT specified from a different wallet will not be displayed as your avatar.

**Required format:**

`{chain ID}/{contract type}:{contract address}/{token ID}`

**Example NFT definition:**

[`137/erc721:0xa429b85fD3458E8d89b0181A6AF93b577AE040DB/181`](https://opensea.io/assets/matic/0xa429b85fD3458E8d89b0181A6AF93b577AE040DB/181)
manage.avatarUrlRequirements: Required URL must end with .jpg, .png, .gif or .glb
manage.badgeErrorMessage: There was an error collecting your badges
manage.badgesDescription: Translate your wallet activity into achievements with badges, a fun and easy way to enhance your profile just by supporting projects that interest you.
manage.badgesEmpty: You haven't collected any badges yet
manage.badgesNoNew: We didn't find any new badges
manage.badgesSuccess: Success! We found {{count}} new badge{{s}} for you
manage.btcAddressUnsupported: BTC address verification requires a SegWit or Taproot address
manage.btcWalletUnsupported: A BTC browser extension wallet that supports BIP-322 signatures is required (e.g. Hiro or Leather)
manage.clickToChangeVisibility: Click a badge to show / hide on your public profile
manage.connectToManageDescription: Wallet {{address}} must be connected to manage this domain.
manage.connectToVerify: Connect your {{extension}} wallet to verify ownership of this address.
manage.coverJpgOrPngAndMaxSize: Recommended: 1440x200px, 5MB max size, JPG or PNG.
manage.cryptoAddressesDescription: Add crypto addresses to receive payments. Optionally verify addresses on supported blockchains to unlock features for your domain.
manage.cryptoWalletDescription: Designed with features that prioritize the safety of your domains and other onchain investments.
manage.cryptoWalletDescriptionMobile: Designed to prioritize the safety of your domains and other onchain investments.
manage.dnsManagementComingSoon: Manage DNS settings for {{domain}} such as nameservers, records, website hosting and transfers. These settings can be managed at the [Unstoppable Domains website]({{link}}) until the feature is available here.
manage.dnsManagementDescription: DNS records define how your domain behaves, like showing your website content and delivering your email.
manage.emailDescription: Your domain can help keep your identity secure. With email forwarding, use your domain to communicate and your email address stays private.
manage.enableEmailForAddressDescription: Select this option to create an email account for **{{udMeAddress}}** and forward all messages to **{{privateAddress}}**
manage.enableListForSale: Enable {{domain}} to be listed for sale
manage.enableListForSaleDescription: Users may contact me about domain sales inquiries
manage.enterEmailVerificationCode: Please enter the verification code we sent to your email:
manage.enterListForSaleEmail: Add email address for user inquiries
manage.enterValidAddress: Enter a valid address to receive payments in this currency.
manage.enterValidEmail: Please enter a valid email address. You may not use an {{domain}} address
manage.enterValidListForSaleEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
manage.enterValidRecipientAddress: Enter a valid recipient address to transfer your domain.
manage.listForSaleDescription: Your domain will appear in search results and on your UD.me profile as listed for sale, with an option for others to contact you directly via email.
manage.otherDomainsDescription: Select a domain from this portfolio
manage.overwriteExistingReverseResolution: After the update, {{domain}} will no longer be your primary name for this wallet.
manage.pendingChangesDescription: You can't make any changes while your records are updating.
manage.reverseResolutionDescription: Your domain is your Web3 username. Reverse resolution allows web3 applications to display your domain instead of your wallet's address.
manage.reverseResolutionDomain: Your domain {{domain}} is setup to be the primary name for wallet {{address}}
manage.setReverseResolutionDomain: Start a record update to make {{domain}} the primary name for wallet {{address}}.
manage.setupWeb3WebsiteDescription: Bring a decentralized website online for your domain {{domain}} by specifying an IPFS hash.
manage.signing: Confirmation in progress. Leave this window open until complete...
manage.tokenGalleryDescription: Curate a showcase for the digital collectibles associated with your domain's verified crypto addresses.
manage.transferConfirmation1: I understand that I am transferring ownership of this domain and this action is irreversible
manage.transferConfirmation2: I'm not transferring to an exchange address
manage.transferConfirmation3: I'm transferring to a wallet address on the {{chainName}} network
manage.transferDescription: Your domain can be transferred to another wallet. Make sure to read each item in the checklist carefully to ensure your domain is transferred safely.
manage.transferDisabledForErc721: Coming soon for unwrapped ENS domains
manage.transferWarning: You must have the private key in order to manage your domain. If you transfer this domain to an exchange or any other custodial account where you do not control the private key, you will not be able to access your domain. Not your keys, not your domain.

verificationInfoModal.infoDelegateXyz1: You can use the delegate.xyz service to confirm ownership of your address. A small gas fee is required to register with the trusted third party smart contract. This is a good option if you do not want to connect {{walletAddress}} to Unstoppable Domains.
verificationInfoModal.infoDelegateXyz2: After opening the delegate.xyz dashboard, create delegation on {{blockchain}} to this domain ({{ownerAddress}}) and the verification process will be completed automatically after a few minutes.
verificationInfoModal.infoSigning: You can sign a gas-free message with your wallet to confirm ownership of your address. This is a good option if you feel comfortable connecting {{walletAddress}} to Unstoppable Domains.
verificationInfoModal.introduction: Wallet verification is an optional step to prove you control your wallet address. It unlocks features for your domain like portfolio tracking, a collectibles gallery, token gated group chat and more.
verificationInfoModal.title: Verify Your Wallet

manage.verifyAfterConfirm: You can verify this {{currency}} address after changes are saved.
manage.walletAddressIncorrect: Cannot verify address **{{address}}** with connected wallet **{{connectedAddress}}**. Change your wallet's connected account and try again.
manage.walletNotConnected: Unable to connect with {{extension}} wallet. Ensure the browser extension is installed and try again.
manage.web3WebsiteDescription: Level up your domain with Web3 super powers. Launch a censorship resistant website by linking an existing IPFS hash or redirect to a traditional domain.
manage.web3WebsiteLaunchedDescription: Your domain {{domain}} is setup to route traffic to the content specified by your on-chain IPFS hash.
manage.web3WebsiteRemoveDescription: Removing the IPFS on-chain record for domain {{domain}} will take your Web3 website offline.
manage.youCanControlAccessToYourData: You can control the access people have in viewing your data.

push.acceptWarning: Use caution when accepting new chat requests. Scammers may send you fraudulent content, which can result in the loss of your crypto assets. Do not accept this request unless you are sure it is from a safe source.
push.chatNewDescription: Start by searching for a domain or wallet address
push.chatNewRecommendations: Search for a domain or wallet address, or get started with one of these wallets recommended from your onchain activity.
push.chatNewRequestDescription: Click the chat requests button to view your requests
push.clickToUnblock: Select a domain to unblock and reload chat history
push.communitiesCollect: Collect a badge with your domain to join a community
push.communitiesNotReadyDescription: Token gated groups allow your on-chain achievements to unlock exclusive access to conversations.
push.communitiesRequireADomain: To start discovering groups you need to add a Web3 domain to this wallet.
push.configure: Enable Unstoppable Messaging on this device for {{domain}}
push.description: Connect with friends using Unstoppable Messaging, powered by XMTP. Over 2 million onchain identities use XMTP for secure, private, and portable messaging.
push.domainRequiredUpload: A domain is required to upload attachments
push.emptyNotificationsDescription: Subscribe to an app channel to receive notifications like security alerts, crypto news and more.
push.encrypted: You don't have access to this message
push.encryptedDescription: Messages sent before you joined the group are hidden. Only current members can view messages in this group.
push.getAnIdentity: You can add a Web3 domain to your wallet so users can easily identify your messages
push.joinedGroupChatDescription: Since messages are end-to-end encrypted, you can only see chat history from the point you joined the group.
push.linkWarning: Opening links can result in the loss of your crypto assets. Do not open this link unless you are sure it is from a safe source.
push.loadingYourChatDescription: The group chat is being updated with your encryption keys to enable end-to-end encryption between members.
push.memberCountDescription: Members in this list have access to messages sent to the {{name}} group chat
push.noGroupAccessDescription: You don't currently have access to this group. Use the button below to see a list of the groups you are able to join.
push.noPrimaryDomain: Select a domain and setup reverse resolution to enable Unstoppable Messaging
push.notificationsNotReadyDescription: Subscribe to notifications from your favorite Web3 apps to receive security alerts, crypto news and more.
push.searchingForConnections: Searching for recommendations from your wallet activity

setup.chatDescription: Sign the messages with your wallet to enable this device for Web3 messaging.
setup.errorDescription: There was a problem setting up Unstoppable Messaging on your device. Make sure to connect your wallet and sign the requested messages.
setup.existingUserDescription: We found an existing messaging account for {{domain}}. A wallet signature is required to decrypt your messages on this device.
setup.existingUserNeedsNotifications: We found an existing messaging account for {{domain}}. You'll be prompted for a wallet signature required to decrypt your messages on this device, along with an optional signature to subscribe to notifications.
setup.isGasRequiredDescription: Enjoy the freedom of secure messages without the overhead of gas fees.
setup.isItPortableDescription: Use our mobile app for messaging on the go. Your on-chain identity syncs your chat history.
setup.isPushSecureDescription: End-to-end encryption means only you and the intended recipients can view a conversation.
setup.newUserDescription: We need to request a few wallet signatures to enable Unstoppable Messaging for {{domain}}. You'll be able to send end-to-end encrypted messages to other domains and receive decentralized notifications.
setup.notificationsDescription: Sign the messages with your wallet to enable this device for Web3 notifications.
setup.subscriptionsDescription: Checking your account to make sure it's ready for the best messaging experience.
setup.successDescription: Your device is ready for Unstoppable Messaging!
setup.support: We'd love to hear from you.
setup.supportDescription: Send a message to **{{supportHandle}}** for help, feedback or just to say hello.
setup.title: Unstoppable Messaging

push.spamWarning: Others have reported this sender as spam

swap.introContent: Choose a token from your wallet and turn it into a token you want. You'll be able to preview your new tokens before starting the swap.
swap.noQuoteAvailable: No quotes available for {{source}}  → {{destination}} at this time. Select new tokens or try a different amount.
swap.noTokensFound: No tokens found. Try another search.
swap.pairNotSupported: Swapping {{source}}  → {{destination}} is not supported at this time. Choose another token and try again.
swap.swapNotAvailable: Swap is not available in your region
swap.swapping: Swapping your {{source}} → {{destination}}. The estimated processing time is about {{minutes}} minute{{s}}. Leave this window open until complete.

verifiedWallets.notVerified: Ownership by {{domain}} has not been verified
verifiedWallets.title: Verified Wallets
verifiedWallets.topNftsDescription: Collection value determined by floor price
verifiedWallets.topTokensDescription: Token value determined by DEX exchange rate
verifiedWallets.verificationWarning: Use caution when sending funds. Wallet {{address}} may not be controlled by {{domain}}.

wallet.addDomainDescription: Unlock the power of your wallet by adding a domain. Receive crypto, chat, share your portfolio and more with a human readable name.
wallet.addDomainInstructions:
## Transfer an existing domain
If you already have an Unstoppable Domain in another wallet, you can transfer it here using the address below.
wallet.alreadyExists: A wallet already exists for this address
wallet.alreadySentVerification: A verification code for {{emailAddress}} has already been sent. Try again in a few minutes.
wallet.changeRecoveryPhraseDescription: Choose a new password to secure your wallet. **Do not share your password with anyone**, including Unstoppable Domains staff.
wallet.changeRecoveryPhraseSuccessTip: Keep your password in a safe place, and never share it with anyone. If you forget your password, you can restore access with your emergency backup.
wallet.changeRecoveryPhraseTip: You can use your emergency backup to restore access to your wallet if you forgot your password.
wallet.changeSessionLockSuccessTip: Always keep your password in a safe place and do not share it with anyone.
wallet.claimWalletCta: Now that you have some crypto in your wallet, it's time to secure your account with a password.
wallet.claimWalletDescription: Enter your email address and create a password so you can always access your wallet. **Make sure you can access this email address**, since it will be verified each time you sign in.
wallet.claimWalletOtp: Enter the one-time code sent to **{{emailAddress}}** to verify your email address.
wallet.clockDriftError: Device clock ({{deviceTime}}) is out of sync with wallet provider ({{expectedTime}}). Update your settings and try again.
wallet.emailInUse: Email already associated with a wallet
wallet.errorCreatingWallet: There was an error creating your wallet. Try again in a few minutes.
wallet.fundWithPurchaseDescription: Deposit funds from your bank account
wallet.inviteInProgress: Creating your wallet. Leave this window open until complete...
wallet.inviteSendError: Error sending invite. Try again in a few moments
wallet.loadingError: Unable to load balances for **{{address}}**. Try again in a few moments.
wallet.noTokensAvailableForSend: Add some crypto to your wallet to enable more onchain activities.
wallet.onboardConfirmationDescription:
## Confirm email address
The one-time code sent to **{{emailAddress}}** is required to create your wallet.
wallet.onboardSuccessDescription: In a few moments we'll send an email to **{{emailAddress}}** with a new one-time code and your emergency backup information.
wallet.onboardSuccessTitle: Creating your wallet. Leave this window open until complete...
wallet.onboardWithCustodyDescription:
## Create a new wallet
Get up and running with just a single click. Access your new crypto wallet from any device.
wallet.onboardingMessage:
## Let's get you a wallet...
We couldn't find a wallet account for **{{emailAddress}}**. Don't worry, creating a new wallet is easy!
wallet.oneTimeCodeEmailDescription:
## Confirm {{operation}}
The one-time code sent to **{{emailAddress}}** is required to access wallet on this device.
wallet.oneTimeCodeGenericDescription:
## Confirm {{operation}}
Enter your one-time code to confirm access to your wallet on this device.
wallet.oneTimeCodeTotpDescription:
## Confirm {{operation}}
Use the one-time code from your **authenticator app** to confirm access to your wallet on this device.
wallet.readyToUse: Sign in successful! Your wallet is ready to use, click to open.
wallet.receiveAddressCaption: Use this address to receive tokens and collectibles on the **{{blockchain}}** network
wallet.recoveryKitDescription:
Create a new emergency backup by verifying your current password in the field below. You will receive an email with the information needed to recover access to this wallet.

- **Do not share your emergency backup with anyone**

- All previous emergency backups will become inactive when a new one is created
wallet.recoveryKitManage: Your emergency backup was sent to **{{emailAddress}}** on **{{date}}**. This is the only backup that can restore access to your wallet, but you can create a new one at any time.
wallet.recoveryKitSuggest: We recommend creating an emergency backup for your wallet. You can use your emergency backup to restore access if you lose your password.
wallet.recoveryPhraseDescription:
##Sign In
Your credentials are required to unlock access to your wallet on this device. **Do not share your password with anyone**, including Unstoppable Domains staff.
wallet.recoveryPhraseEnabled: Your wallet is secured with the strong password you created during setup. Access this wallet on any device using your password.
wallet.rememberOnThisDeviceDescription: Your access will be stored securely in this web browser
wallet.resetPasswordDescription:
## Password reset
Choose a new password to access your wallet. Store your password in safe place. **Do not share your password with anyone**, including Unstoppable Domains staff.
wallet.resetPasswordStrength: Choose a stronger password. Your password must be > 12 characters and include at least one number and one special character
wallet.resolutionError: Could not find recipient wallet address
wallet.safeToCloseWindow: You can safely close this window while the transfer is confirmed onchain
wallet.securityHealthCheckDescription: You can visit the security center to view recommendations to keep your crypto safe.
wallet.selectAssetToBuy: Select token to deposit using a bank account
wallet.selectAssetToBuySell: Select token to deposit or withdraw using a bank account
wallet.sessionLockDisabledDescription: We recommend protecting your wallet with a session timeout. You'll be prompted for a password if you're away longer than an hour.
wallet.sessionLockEnabledDescription: Your wallet will be automatically locked after an hour of inactivity.
wallet.sessionLockError: Invalid password. Use the password you created when you enabled session timeout on this device.
wallet.sessionLockForgotDescription:
There are two ways to restore access to your wallet if you don't remember your session timeout password:

- Use the most recent **emergency backup** we sent to **{{emailAddress}}**

- Sign out of your wallet and **sign in again** using **{{emailAddress}}** and your account password
wallet.sessionLockSetup: Choose a password to protect your wallet session. This password will be required to unlock your wallet if you're away for more than an hour.
wallet.sessionLockSetupTip: Your session timeout password does not have to be the same as your account password.
wallet.setPasswordNowOrLater: You can set your password now, or do it later using the security center menu option
wallet.shareAddress:
You can send crypto to my {{network}} wallet!

{{address}}
wallet.signDappOperationDescription: **{{name}}** wants to **{{actionText}}**. Verify the following details before confirming.
wallet.signMessageDescription: Only confirm if you fully understand the content and trust the requesting site.
wallet.simulationDescription: Expected results are not a guarantee. They are an estimation of your wallet balance after confirming this action. Ensure you trust the app that prompted this confirmation.
wallet.twoFactorAuthenticationDescription: Two-factor authentication (2FA) is highly recommended to ensure your wallet is secure. Use any authenticator app, such as Google Authenticator.
wallet.twoFactorAuthenticationDisabled: We recommend hardening your wallet's security with an authenticator app, such as Google Authenticator.
wallet.twoFactorAuthenticationEnabled: Your wallet is secured with an authenticator app.
wallet.txInsufficientFunds: Transaction may fail due to insufficient funds
wallet.txLockDescription: Lock down your wallet to block all outbound activity such as sending crypto or signing transactions.
wallet.txLockManualDescription: Your wallet can be unlocked at any time using a one-time code from your authenticator app.
wallet.txLockManualStatus: Your wallet is in receive-only mode
wallet.txLockManualTip: You'll need to unlock your wallet before sending crypto or signing any transactions.
wallet.txLockPrerequisite: Setup two-factor authentication to enable access to the receive-only feature.
wallet.txLockTimeDescription: Your wallet remains permanently locked until a future date of your choosing.
wallet.txLockTimeTip: You won't be able to unlock your wallet or send crypto before your chosen date. Please choose carefully.

webacy.riskScoreDescription: Webacy analysis indicates a Safety Score to measure risk when interacting with the account owning this domain.
webacy.share: Share your Webacy Safety Score on X
webacy.shareMessage: Check out my Safety Score powered by @unstoppableweb and @mywebacy on my UD profile #safetyscore #walletrisk
